content.rendered:
Ariana Afghan Airlines Co. Ltd. , also known as Ariana, is the largest airline of Afghanistan and serves as the country’s national carrier. Founded in 1955, Ariana is the oldest airline of Afghanistan. The company has its main base at Kabul International Airport, from where it operates domestically, and also provides international connections that link Afghanistan  with  China,  Germany,  India,  Iran,  Kuwait,  Pakistan, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Tajikistan and Turkey. The carrier is headquartered in Shāre Naw, Kabul, and it is wholly owned by the Afghan government. Ariana Afghan Airlines has been on the list of air carriers banned in the European Union since October 2006.

View Ariana Afghan  Airlines Hand / Cabin | Checked Baggage Allowance  rates in the below link

Ariana Afghan Airlines Checked Baggage

Ariana Afghan Airlines Hand | Cabin Baggage

Ariana Afghan Airlines Offices Worldwide
